channel.title: I need help, any reply will help!
channel.description:
Well, I'm back with more questions and problems, any answer is greatly appreciated.
Well, I have a problem, when my character dies in pvp or pvn, both ways, he loses nothing, and in pvp, i would like him to lose items, how do I do that?
Also, I have no clue how to add a drop to my npc. Does anyone know how?
I would like to add customs aswell, but they always override something else, causing a "null", can someone tell me how to fix this? And another thing, how do I put them in the right slot, like a cape in the cape slot? Also, if any of you wouldn't mind showing me how to add stats to my items too, and making them hit properly.
Thanks for the help guys, any answer or reply is helpful.

item.title: I need help, any reply will help!
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Well, I’m back with more questions and problems, any answer is greatly appreciated.

Well, I have a problem, when my character dies in pvp or pvn, both ways, he loses nothing, and in pvp, i would like him to lose items, how do I do that?

Also, I have no clue how to add a drop to my npc.
Does anyone know how?

I would like to add customs aswell, but they always override something else, causing a “null”, can someone tell me how to fix this?
And another thing, how do I put them in the right slot, like a cape in the cape slot?
Also, if any of you wouldn’t mind showing me how to add stats to my items too, and making them hit properly.

Thanks for the help guys, any answer or reply is helpful.

Read full topic
